info.description: Bloggo is a REST Api for blogging
info.title: Bloggo API

get.description: get all articles navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last article in recent array of article
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many article you want to take
parameters.name: limit

get.description: get detail of article specified by id

post.description: send authorization header with password payload to change password

get.description: get all comments navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last comment in recent array of comment
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many comment you want to take
parameters.name: limit

get.description: get all drafts navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last draft in recent array of draft
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many draft you want to take
parameters.name: limit

get.description: get detail of draft specified by id
get all inboxes navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last inbox in recent array of inboxes
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many inboxes you want to take
parameters.name: limit

post.description: send username and password to get JWT Token via cookie
post.summary: send username and password to get JWT Token

get.description: get all media navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last media in recent array of media
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many media you want to take
parameters.name: limit

get.description: get all ratings navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last rating in recent array of rating
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many rating you want to take
parameters.name: limit

get.description: get summed ratings navigated by last-id and limit.

post.description: send username, password, bio, and avatar url

get.description: get all users navigated by last-id and limit.

parameters.description: ID of the last user in recent array of user
parameters.name: last-id

parameters.description: how many user you want to take
parameters.name: limit

get.description: get detail of user specified by id

put.summary: update an user, only super-admin can update role

get.description: get detail of user specified by id
get.summary: get one user public information (without password information)
